## ComponentBuilder interface

Component builder interface for wrapping TEA components.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface ComponentBuilder<M> 
```

## Remarks

Component builders provide an adapter between TEA components (which follow the Model-Update-View pattern) and the DSL. When you register a component via [AppBuilder.component()](./dsl.appbuilder.component.md)<!-- -->, you provide a `ComponentBuilder` that handles initialization, updates, and rendering.

## Example


```typescript
const spinnerBuilder: ComponentBuilder<SpinnerModel> = {
  init: () => {
    const model = new SpinnerModel()
    return [model, model.tick()]
  },
  update: (model, msg) => model.update(msg),
  view: (model) => model.view(),
}
```

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[init()](./dsl.componentbuilder.init.md)


</td><td>

Initialize the component and return the initial model and command.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[update(model, msg)](./dsl.componentbuilder.update.md)


</td><td>

Update the component with a message.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[view(model)](./dsl.componentbuilder.view.md)


</td><td>

Render the component to a string.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
